name: Unified POS & Loyalty App
description: Unified Point of Sale system with customer loyalty features. Express.js serves POS at /pos, Next.js serves loyalty at /loyalty. Built with React, Express.js, Next.js, and PostgreSQL.

scripts.postdeploy: psql $DATABASE_URL -f db/database.sql && cd loyalty-app && psql $DATABASE_URL -f db/loyalty-database-changes.sql
